rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+i to Page Up, Space+u to Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+y to Home, Space+o to End
SpaceFN: Space+Backquote (`) to Escape, Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12
SpaceFN: Space+p to Print Screen, Space+Open Bracket ([) to Scroll Lock, Space+Close Bracket (]) to Pause, Space+Backspace to Forward Delete, Space+Backslash (\) to Insert
